title: Uni lecturer and three others hospitalized after student attack
content: Four individuals including a university lecturer have been hospitalized following an assault by a group of students from the Sri Jayawardenapura University. The attack had occurred yesterday (March 14) afternoon when the lecturer had intervened in order to disperse a crowd of aggressive students, Dr. N.L.A. Karunaratne, Vice Chancellor of the University of Sri Jayawardenapura…
